comments:
scripted handler example does not run in 116

Possible problems:
1. I do not see file named excaliburScriptEventHandler.xhtml in directory 
		org.eclipse.scripting.examples
2. the path in the stack trace below says 'plugin' not 'plugins'

Steps:
File-> New-> Other
select Other category
select Scripted Handler Example
Next
The following is printed to the Console:

--- Fri Jun 01 17:59:31 EDT 2001 ---
